means: （入口处等的）旋转式栅门，旋杆

sentence.Network_en: I heard a voice at the turnstile I had not heard for many years.
sentence.Network_cn: 我听到在旋转栅门那儿有一个多年没有听到的嗓声.

sentence.Network_en: You slip the token into the slot at the turnstile.
sentence.Network_cn: 你在入口处那儿把辅币塞进投币孔.

sentence.Network_en: More than three thousand people go through the turnstile in an hour.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 国际贸易>风电词汇中英文对照表 ... turning 旋转, 转向, 转弯处 turnstile 十字转门 turntable 转车, 转盘.
turning lane 车道turnstile 回转栏twin box culvert 双盒形暗渠
他们好比一个人带着四件行李(贪爱世界,罪恶,撒但,自我),力图从入口处的旋转式栅门(turnstile)通过,进入上帝的国度。他们想要进去,以便得着幸福,又可以远避地狱.

entry.tran: (博物馆、足球场等入口处的)旋转栅门，十字转门
entry.def: A turnstile is a mechanical barrier at the entrance to a place such as a museum or a football ground. Turnstiles have metal arms that you push round as you go through them and enter the building or area.

means.word_mean: 1. a gate consisting of a post that acts as a pivot for rotating arms; set in a passageway for controlling the persons entering

auth_sentence.content: The metal pike of the turnstile.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The metal pike of the turnstile.

auth_sentence.content: There was no turnstile and no officialdom just me and the legends surrounding the stones.
auth_sentence.res_content: There was no turnstile and no officialdom just me and the legends surrounding the stones.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There was no turnstile and no officialdom just me and the legends surrounding the stones.

auth_sentence.content: Each time you go on a lift, the sensor that opens the turnstile records your lift pass number.
